M

Main - Class in src
This is the main class that is used to instantiate the src.controller, from where the flow of the game starts.
Main() - Constructor for class src.Main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class src.Main
This is the main method, called by operating system to begin execution of program
MainController - Class in src.controller
As our architecture is MVC, this is the main src.controller, that adds action listeners too all the GUI components, defined and declared in src.view.
MainController(StarterWindow) - Constructor for class src.controller.MainController
This is the constructor to the controller.
mainWindow - Variable in class src.controller.MainController
 
MainWindow - Class in src.view
This is the main window, that contains all the other panels and in which we load the map.
MainWindow() - Constructor for class src.view.MainWindow
 
mapConnectivity() - Method in class src.model.Maps
This function checks whether the map is a connected graph or not.
MapEditor - Class in src.model
This class is used to instantiate the map editor, to enable the user to add or delete the country, continent.
MapEditor(Integer, String) - Constructor for class src.model.MapEditor
This is the constructor to the class MapEditor and starts the flow of editor towards editing the previously existing map or creating a new map on the basis of received parameters.
mapLocation - Variable in class src.model.Maps
This data member is used to store the map path
mapObj - Variable in class src.model.MapEditor
The map object containing, the map information being edited or created.
Maps - Class in src.model
This class is used to instantiate maps, which reads the map files into memory.
Maps(String, Integer) - Constructor for class src.model.Maps
This is the constructor to Maps class, and is used to set the map location.
maxTurnsReached - Variable in class src.model.GameConfig
